Improvements.Improvement: Reduce repetition by creating a helper function
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- path.getGet().getTags().contains(relatedEntityTag)
- path.getPost().getTags().contains(relatedEntityTag)
- path.getDelete().getTags().contains(relatedEntityTag)
- path.getPatch().getTags().contains(relatedEntityTag)
+ checkPathAndTag(path.getGet(), relatedEntityTag)
+ checkPathAndTag(path.getPost(), relatedEntityTag)
+ checkPathAndTag(path.getDelete(), relatedEntityTag)

Improvements.Description: There is a lot of repetition in your code. You repeatedly check if a path is null and if it contains a specific tag. This is ideal for a helper function. You can create a function to check if a path is null and if it contains a specific tag. This will make your code cleaner and easier to read.
